metadata.description: Guns. Acid. Cameras. School. The themes behind the controversial Hellblazer: 'Shoot' by WARREN ELLIS and PHIL JIMENEZ merge with the attitude of the GRANT MORRISON and PHILIP BOND masterpiece of teenage revolt, Kill Your Boyfriend, delivering a story of magic, passion and disinformation. WILD CHILDREN: A different type of education.
metadata.name: Wild Children
